data.name: LogRecord
desc: assembles the complete information about a to-be-logged event

properties.name: LoggerName
desc: specifies the name of the logger at which the record is logged

properties.name: SourceClassName
desc: specifies the name of the class, in which the record was logged.
This name might be empty, in case the caller to one of the various log methods of XLogger did not specify it.

properties.name: SourceMethodName
desc: specifies the name of the method, in which the record was logged.
This name might be empty, in case the caller to one of the various log methods of XLogger did not specify it.

properties.name: LogTime
desc: specifies the time at which the event was logged

properties.name: SequenceNumber
desc: specifies the number of the log event.
Subsequent events get assigned increasing sequence numbers by the XLogger at which they're logged.

properties.name: ThreadID
desc: specifies the ID of the thread in which the event was logged

properties.name: Level
desc: specifies the level of the log event
